title: Need More Space, Great 2 Bedroom!
posting_body: Want more info on this unit?
Alton Green Apartments in Denver, CO
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 1070-1100 Sq.

Alton Green Apartments in Denver, Colorado offers peaceful, secluded living just minutes from the urban vibe of Cherry Creek Shopping Center or an easy commute to Downtown Denver or the Denver Tech Center.
You'll be wonderfully close to some of the city's best shopping centers, boutique shopping, dining, coffee shops and more.
Or, if you'd rather walk or ride than shop, we're located along the beautiful Highline Canal Trail, just minutes from several parks and the Cherry Creek Reservoir.
Alton Green is in the Cherry Creek School District and is located in close proximity to the Bel-Rea Institute.
Our welcoming neighborhood will make you feel at home, and our unprecedented commitment to service will keep you happy to live here, long after you move in.

All of our one and two bedroom apartments are newly renovated and feature contemporary stainless steel appliances with espresso cabinetry or modern black appliances with oak cabinetry, lighting, and plumbing, two-tone paint, and brushed nickel finishes for a sleek, modern look.

Our residents enjoy our exceptionally spacious floor plans - some of the largest in the area - which feature sunny over-sized windows, huge walk-in closets, central heat and air conditioning, high-speed internet capability, and the convenience of a full-size washer/dryer set.
We've added wood-burning fireplaces to keep things cozy and a private patio or balcony with extra storage for your enjoyment (available in most homes).

Just outside your door you'll find lush, mature landscaping, and plenty of amenities: a beautiful clubhouse with an executive business center, complete with free wi-fi, printer, and fax; delicious coffee and tea at our Starbucks coffee bar, 24-hour fitness center, complimentary tanning booth, off-leash dog park, and sparkling pool and spa.
We are only minutes away from plenty of shopping and restaurants, and pets are welcome (call for details).
Come visit us in person; we'll be happy to show you around.
After you have moved into Alton Green, be sure to take advantage of our resident referral program and get paid to choose your own neighbors!
Our leasing office is conveniently open during the week from 9am to 6pm Monday through Friday and from 10am to 5pm on Saturdays to assist you in any way we can.
We invite you to preview our community by viewing our photo gallery.
Schedule a personalized tour of apartments by calling
, or stop by Alton Green Apartments today and see why so many other people chose us as their place to call home!
- Recycling bins located throughout the community
* From 225 & Parker: Go north on Parker to Florida; east on Florida about half a mile.
Alton Green is on your left.
* From 225 & Mississippi: Go west on Mississippi to Havana; south on Havana to Florida; west on Florida about one mile.
Alton Green is on your right.
$250 non-refundable fee for first pet, $250 refundable deposit for first pet, $125 non-refundable fee for each additional pet.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
